topic.title: Hearing Plan Of Care Activity Act - conformance rules

lines.i:
Template Design Relationships This template is a specialization of the IHE UV Realm HPoC Activity Act template. Machine readable entries associated with this template use US Realm vocabulary constraints established for this purpose.
The design is a specialization of the C-CDA R1.1 Plan of Care Activity Act template (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39). A value set is added to express the type of care activities relevant to a hearing plan of care.
Template Purpose This is the generic template for the Plan of Care Activity. This template is used to record actions the patient or patient's family should perform and education that should be received.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.7.3.1.1.26.2.4.2"
SHALL conform to Consol Plan Of Care Activity Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet VS_HPoCActivityAct 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.7.3.1.1.26.2.5.4 STATIC 1

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
SHALL satisfy: contains exactly one [1..1] reference such that it contains exactly one [1..1] @value such that it begins with a '#' and points to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, Section 4.3.5.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
SHALL satisfy: contains exactly one [1..1] low and contains exactly one [1..1] high
SHALL conform to Consol Plan Of Care Activity Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Plan of Care moodCode (Act/Encounter/Procedure) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.23 STATIC (CONF:8539)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8539)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet VS_HPoCActivityAct 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.7.3.1.1.26.2.5.4 STATIC 1

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text
SHALL satisfy: contains exactly one [1..1] reference such that it contains exactly one [1..1] @value such that it begins with a '#' and points to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, Section 4.3.5.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
SHALL satisfy: contains exactly one [1..1] low and contains exactly one [1..1] high

SHALL satisfy: contains exactly one [1..1] reference such that it contains exactly one [1..1] @value such that it begins with a '#' and points to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, Section 4.3.5.1)
SHALL satisfy: contains exactly one [1..1] low and contains exactly one [1..1] high

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="947812579"/> <code code="237952943"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> </act>

p.ph: Hearing Plan Of Care Activity Act
